name: msgid
description: Unique identifier for this message. Provided by the source or generated during ingestion

name: source_type
description: Type of source (AIS, VMS, SAR, VIRS, etc...)

name: source_tenant
description: The proprietary of the data (Eg: country)

name: source_ssvid
description: Source-Specific Vessel ID. this is the record id provided by the source or a unique identifier generated by us

name: ssvid
description: Unique Id combining source_tenant and source_ssvid

name: timestamp
description: This is the unix timestamp for the time the message was received by the original receiver.  You should use this as the effective timestamp for the message

name: callsign
description: Radio call sign of the MMSI-registered vessel

name: receiver
description: Identifier for the specific receiver if available

name: length
description: The length of the boat in meters

name: width
description: The width of the boat in meters

name: class_b_cs_flag
description: AIS Specific, left for pipe compatibility, it should always be NULL

name: ingested_at
description: The exact moment this record was read from the source.

name: timestamp_date
description: This is the day when the message was received by the original receiver in UTC
